agents.prompt: make an agent which summarizes my last n emails

endpoints.summary: Fetch the last n emails from Gmail and generate AI-powered summaries of their content

query_parameters.name: n
query_parameters.description: Number of last emails to summarize

agents.task_description:
Task: make an agent which summarizes my last n emails
Workflow steps (execute in order):
  1. Connect to Gmail account (Gmail) — Authenticate and establish connection to the user's Gmail account
  2. Get the last n emails from inbox (Gmail) — Retrieve the most recent n email messages, including subject, sender, content, and metadata
  3. Extract email content and metadata (Gmail) — Parse each email to extract key information like subject, sender, date, and body text
  4. Summarize the extracted email data — Generate a concise summary of the n emails including key topics, senders, and important information
  5. Format and present the email summary — Structure the summary in a readable format for the user
Endpoint 0: POST /summarize-recent-emails — Fetch the last n emails from Gmail and generate AI-powered summaries of their content
Services: Gmail
Parameters:
- n (int, query, endpoint 0): Specifies how many recent emails to fetch and summarize

agents.prompt: make an agent which summarize my last n emails

endpoints.summary: Fetch the last n emails from Gmail and generate a summary of their content

query_parameters.name: n
query_parameters.description: Number of last emails to retrieve and summarize

agents.task_description:
Task: make an agent which summarize my last n emails
Workflow steps (execute in order):
  1. Get the last n emails from the user's Gmail inbox (Gmail) — Retrieves the most recent n emails from the inbox, including email content, subject, sender, and timestamp
  2. Extract key information from each email (Gmail) — Processes each email to extract relevant details like subject, sender, main content, and key points for summarization
  3. Generate a summary of all the retrieved emails (Gmail) — Creates a concise summary that includes key topics, important information, and overview of the n most recent emails
Endpoint 0: POST /summarize-emails — Fetch the last n emails from Gmail and generate a summary of their content
Services: Gmail
Parameters:
- n (int, query, endpoint 0): Specifies how many of the most recent emails to fetch for summarization
